EXPLORE WITH US

Residing in the heart of the city of Bangalore, nurturing young minds to think and inspire by opening up a new world full of knowledge, creativity and innovation during the most vital years of their life.

KNOW MORE ABOUT St.GEORGE COLLEGE

ST. George is a diverse place built on the foundation of academic excellence, sustained growth and ethical values fostering an environment of curiosity and learning. With its enduring commitment to futuristic approach it is the perfect place for studentsâ€™ holistic development.

KNOW MORE ABOUT St.GEORGE COLLEGE

Journeying from the past 22 years and thriving together with our students as our keystone. Identifying the needs of each individual uniquely and offering to them tailored environment to grow and develop to fullest of their potential.

WHERE LEARNING IS DOING

We at St. George have enriched a culture of learning through practical application and experience. We are strong believers of the fact that true education and knowledge is imparted only when students get a chance to experience it and when everything is tried and tested. Our college is situated in the heart of Bangalore city. Its proximity to the industry is one of the greatest benefits we offer to our students. Delegates and associates from top companies are invited to deliver guest lectures and sessions. This provides students with valuable insights of how things flow in the actual business world. Students are also provided with internships. This fabricates an environment where they get the opportunity to learn and develop themselves through practicadl experiences.
Hear from our past students how practical learning helped them grow and strive as an individual.

Discover more

HEAR FROM OUR STUDENTS

HEAR FROM
OUR STUDENTS

ST GEORGIAN

We are One!

Students from diverse communities, different cultural backgrounds and different parts of the world come here to learn and grow. Once they become students of our college, once they enter our housing facilities; they are no longer just an individual. They are a ST.Georgian and they become a part of our community.

Discover More

Inspiration

Get inspired from the inspirers

Life of a student is framed in the guidance of his teachers. Students are like blank canvases waiting to be inspired. Teachers play a role of inspirers in the lives of students. Our teaching fraternity and faculty are led by high knowledge personnel who are each experts in their field of operations. Most of them are Ph.D. holders and have a vast teaching experience. They have an inherent love for teaching and to help their students develop holistically. No amount of words could suffice the impact a teacher has on its students. We truly realize this importance. We also understand that each student is different and needs a unique approach towards learning. Therefore, students are treated both collectively and individually to help them grow and excel.

Discover more

HEAR FROM OUR FACULTIES

HEAR FROM
OUR FACULTIES

LIVING

Campus Life at St.George

Our campus is a perfect example of how little can be beautiful. Instead of huge buildings and complicated infrastructure, ours is a beautiful and elegant one. The campus is situated in the heart of the city and is close to all the technical and huge organisations. This adds value to the campus life. Students get exposure and a chance to talk and interact with different industry experts who walk in and around the campus. They also deliver various guest lectures and presentations. The campus is well suited to the needs of the programmes we provide. In the current scenario where change has become the way of life, we make sure that with these changes our infrastructure is kept up to date. We inculcate the necessary changes required to enhance the quality of learning. The overall emphasis is laid down on the infrastructure that enables practical learning. We also have auditoriums, functioning halls, presentation halls and labs to supplement the requirement of the courses that we provide.
